Romantic fantasy, starring Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden and Helena Bonham Carter.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A troubled teenager moves to a tough inner-city school after her mother's death, but struggles to settle into her vastly different life - until a new boyfriend helps her discover a fresh sense of purpose through the power of dance. Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington.

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: A slobbish Las Vegas lounge singer succeeds the British throne when a freak accident wipes out the entire royal family. A loyal aristocrat desperately tries to stop the loud-mouthed American unwittingly bringing the monarchy into disrepute, while a scheming lord plots to make his reign a short one. Comedy, starring John Goodman, Peter O'Toole, John Hurt and Richard Griffiths.

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: The fur flies when a pampered California pooch is sent to live with a wise cracking farm hound. However, when a couple of bumbling thieves attempt to break into their home, they must put aside their differences to defend their home. Family comedy, starring Joris Jarsky, Ryan Belleville and Dylan Schmid.

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A troubled teenager moves to a tough inner-city school after her mother's death, but struggles to settle into her vastly different life - until a new boyfriend helps her discover a fresh sense of purpose through the power of dance. Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb.

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: A race of strange, babbling yellow creatures has served the cause of evil throughout the history of the world. In the 1960s, three of these eternal henchmen get a job working for a criminal genius who is hatching a plot against the British crown - but while carrying out her orders, they uncover a threat to their whole species. Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep

Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley.(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A fairy living in a forest encounters a member of a lumber crew and magically shrinks him down to her size. He learns about the damage humans are doing to the area, and helps defend it when his fellow loggers unwittingly unleash an evil spirit that had been entombed in a tree. Animated adventure, with the voices of Robin Williams, Christian Slater and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger grimly realise the good life is about to come to an abrupt end as flood waters threaten their homes. However, a vulture suggests they could turn an old giant tree into a boat and make their escape, so the three friends set off in search of it. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo and Denis Leary.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher.(n)

programme.title: The Secret of Moonacre
programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.(n)

Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.(n)

He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny.(n)

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leader's plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Children's fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn.(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan, David Soul and Robert Urich.

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: Two South African police officers, one black and one white, investigate the murder of a teenage girl. The case brings to light the lingering consequences of apartheid, and forces both men to face up to their own roles in their country's brutal history. Crime drama based on Caryl Ferey's novel, with Forest Whitaker and Orlando Bloom.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Captive
programme.desc: A fugitive fleeing from a police manhunt is desperate to see his newborn son. Needing a hiding place, he takes a recovering meth addict hostage in her own home. The pair make an unlikely connection as they bond over finding ways to cope with the challenges in their lives. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Mara and David Oyelowo.

programme.title: Kidnapping Freddy Heineken
programme.desc: Five men struggling to make ends meet decide to kidnap a beer tycoon who is one of Europe's richest men. The plan is a success, and they demand the biggest ransom in history - but tensions within the group threaten their chances of escaping the law. Fact-based crime drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Jim Sturgess and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher embarks on what she believes is a harmless flirtation with the handsome teenager living next door. In a moment of weakness, she succumbs to his advances, and things turn nasty when she tries to end their affair. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman and Kristin Chenoweth.

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow.

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher embarks on what she believes is a harmless flirtation with the handsome teenager living next door. In a moment of weakness, she succumbs to his advances, and things turn nasty when she tries to end their affair. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman and Kristin Chenoweth.

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Two supermarket checkout girls covering for their friends on Christmas Eve get drawn into a drugs sting and are forced to cross a dealer to save themselves. Their absent colleagues endure a disastrous night's gambling in Las Vegas, while two men forced to take part in the sting find themselves spending a festive night with a narcotics agent. Drama, starring Katie Holmes, William Fichtner and JE Freeman.

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Uncompromising detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan hunts the ringleaders behind a bizarre death lottery which is seemingly being used to murder well-known figures. The case becomes personal when he discovers his own name is on the list of prospective victims. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Patricia Clarkson, Liam Neeson and an early appearance by Jim Carrey.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: A boxing champion's successful life is brought to an abrupt end when tragedy strikes. He turns to a trainer coaching amateur fighters in a run-down gym for help and tries to rebuild his sporting career - while also striving to regain the lost trust of his wife and daughter. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Forest Whitaker and Rachel McAdams.

programme.title: Bound to Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman who is kidnapped fights back and manages to escape from her captor. She later learns she was not his only victim, and that there was a dark secret behind her abduction. The discovery drives her to hatch a plan to punish him for the suffering he has caused. Thriller, starring Tina Ivlev.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russia's first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelow's fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: A cop's career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell.

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A political lobbyist recovering from a painful break-up forms a passionate new relationship with a charming stranger. However, she begins to wonder whether she can trust her new boyfriend has his behaviour grows increasingly volatile - a situation that only gets worse when her ex resurfaces. Thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan and Michael Ealy.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchie's comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham.

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.(n)

programme.title: We Still Kill the Old Way
programme.desc: A former gangster returns to London after 30 years living in exile in Spain when he receives word of his brother's murder. Angered by the brutality of a new generation of criminals who have taken over his territory, he gets his old partners in crime back together to avenge his sibling and restore order to the streets. Gangster drama, starring Ian Ogilvy and Allison Doody.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: In a move to identify suspected hijackers, an undercover police officer infiltrates the high-octane world of illegal late-night street racing by rival gangs. He is befriended by a champion driver, but when he also forms a bond with the racer's sister, he is pitched into a conflict of loyalties. Thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.(n)

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth.(n)

As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.(n)

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy, withdrawn teenager discovers she has paranormal powers, which she uses to protect herself from her abusive mother and classmates. When a friendly student invites her to the prom, she is determined to enjoy herself and is amazed when she is crowned queen of the ball - but joy turns to fury when her tormentors play a cruel prank. Brian De Palma's adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, with Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie and Amy Irving.

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Julie James, the survivor of the original bloody events, sets off for a holiday in the Bahamas - but as soon as she arrives, her arch-enemy returns from the dead, forcing her into a desperate battle for survival. Horror sequel, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jnr, Brandy Norwood and Mekhi Phifer.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A weedy flower-shop assistant grows a bizarre plant, which he discovers needs to feed on human blood to survive. It grows to a vast size and begins to talk, demanding he commit murder on its behalf. Comedy musical based on the Broadway show, starring Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin and Bill Murray, with the voice of The Four Tops' Levi Stubbs.

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from its first creation, Jurassic Park is now a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs. In need of a new attraction, the company behind the park creates an entirely new species - but it quickly escapes to terrorise the tourists. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.

As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from its first creation, Jurassic Park is now a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs. In need of a new attraction, the company behind the park creates an entirely new species - but it quickly escapes to terrorise the tourists. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard.

programme.title: Pandemic
programme.desc: A doctor working to find a cure for a virus that has swept the world turning people into frenzied monsters. She joins a rescue team sent into the devastated ruins of Los Angeles in the hope of finding uninfected survivors. Thriller shot entirely from first-person perspectives, starring Rachel Nichols, Alfie Allen, Missi Pyle and Mekhi Phifer.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: A dull American town in the middle of the desert is suddenly attacked by huge man-eating subterranean creatures. Luckily, two dimwitted but brave handymen step into the breach to lead a ragtag bunch of locals and a mismatched pair of survivalists in the battle against the gruesome worm-like monsters. Comedy horror, with Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross, Reba McEntire and Bobby Jacoby.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde.

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A weedy flower-shop assistant grows a bizarre plant, which he discovers needs to feed on human blood to survive. It grows to a vast size and begins to talk, demanding he commit murder on its behalf. Comedy musical based on the Broadway show, starring Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin and Bill Murray, with the voice of The Four Tops' Levi Stubbs.

programme.title: The X Files
programme.desc: FBI special agents Mulder and Scully are reassigned from their paranormal investigations to deal with a terrorist attack on a government building. They discover the bombing is an attempt to cover up the existence of an alien virus that threatens all life on Earth. Sci-fi thriller based on the TV series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Martin Landau and Armin Mueller-Stahl.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: Android
programme.desc: A reclusive robotics expert shuts himself away from the world working on a secret project for years. He invites a science journalist to observe the fruits of his labours - an android capable of human emotion. However, they discover the machine has a dangerous side to its nature. Sci-fi thriller, starring Mark Webber and Lucy Griffiths.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.

programme.title: Chastity Bites
programme.desc: A 500-year-old murderer maintains her eternal youth by bathing in the blood of virgins, and sustains her supplies by leading a double life as a conservative campaigner for sexual abstinence. A teenage blogger discovers her secret, and tries to prevent her friend from becoming the latest victim. Comedy horror, starring Allison Scagliotti and Louise Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Three backpackers travelling across Europe hear of a Slovakian inn where their every hedonistic desire will be met. However, they discover they have been lured into the clutches of wealthy depraved businessmen who pay for the chance to torture people to death. Horror, starring Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson and Eythor Gudjonsson.(n)

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young hero's quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Edne's novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: An English cartographer travelling through 18th century Eastern Europe loses his way in bad weather and finds shelter in a village whose people are living in fear of a mysterious evil force that surrounds the area. Will building a moat around their homes protect them from the malevolent entity, or is it already in their midst? Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Flemyng, Charles Dance and Aleksey Chadov.(n)

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has been working alone at an energy-generating base on the moon for three years and desperately longs to return home. After he is injured in an accident, he begins to discover the disturbing truth about the operation he is running, and is forced to question his own identity. Sci-fi drama, starring Sam Rockwell, with the voice of Kevin Spacey.(n)

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.(n)

programme.title: Dark Signal
programme.desc: A murdered girl's spirit returns with a message for the staff of a radio station. Horror, starring Siwan Morris, Gareth David-Lloyd, Joanna Ignaczewska and Duncan Pow.(n)

programme.title: Hustle & Flow
programme.desc: A pimp and drug pusher decides to change his ways after reaching the age at which his father died. Using his experience of life on the streets, he becomes a rapper, and an encounter with a local hip-hop star gives him the perfect chance to begin his career in music. Drama, starring Terrence Howard, Anthony Anderson, Taryn Manning and Isaac Hayes.

programme.title: Colt 45
programme.desc: Vincent, a young police firearms expert, is forced to make use of his skills as a marksman when he is ambushed by an unknown assailant. Left with a killing to cover up, Vincent turns to a fellow gun enthusiast with ties to the criminal underworld offers to help him dispose of the evidence. In exchange, he hands over a small arsenal of weapons - including a set of home-made, explosive .45 ammo, but when said guns are used in a string of deadly robberies, Vincent must turn to seasoned police commander Chavez to help correct his fatal error of judgement. French action thriller, starring Ymanol Perset, Joey Starr and Gerard Lanvin.

programme.title: Cub
programme.desc: A young boy goes on a camping trip with his fellow Cub Scouts, and crosses paths with a bloodthirsty poacher. Belgian horror, starring Maurice Luijten, Evelien Bosmans and Titus De Voogdt. In Flemish, French and Dutch.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged.

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.

programme.title: Stations of the Cross
programme.desc: A girl from a strict Catholic family is an outsider in her secular school, and faces constant reproach from her fundamentalist mother. Under the tuition of a misguided priest, she pushes herself to extreme acts of self-sacrifice in her pursuit of spiritual redemption. Drama, starring Lea van Acken and Florian Stetter. In German, French and Latin.

programme.title: The Black Orchid
programme.desc: A gangster's widow blames herself for her husband's death, as she becomes the subject of malicious rumours that she drove him to a life of crime. A man who is also widowed falls in love with her, but his daughter is determined to stop them from marrying. Comedy, starring Sophia Loren, Anthony Quinn, Ina Balin and Peter Mark Richman.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: A series of devastating personal traumas leave a woman feeling self-destructive and lost. After spending years behaving recklessly, she decides to turn things around by embarking on an epic, solo trek along America's 1,000-mile-long Pacific Crest Trail, which gives her the time and space to reassess her existence. Drama based on a true story, starring Reese Witherspoon and Laura Dern.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson.

programme.title: Couple in a Hole
programme.desc: A couple choose to live in a cave in the woods, surviving by hunting rabbits and feeding on insects. When the wife is bitten by a poisonous spider, they are forced to reconnect with the outside world and turn to a farmer for help, who takes a suspicious interest in their reasons for renouncing civilisation. Drama, starring Paul Higgins and Kate Dickie.

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth.

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: Two brothers have tended a herd of sheep together for 40 years, but never speak to each other. When a disease outbreak prompts the government to impose a cull on livestock, they put their differences aside to protect their animals - each using his own unusual methods. Drama, starring Sigurdur Sigurjonsson and Theodor Juliusson. In Icelandic.

programme.title: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
programme.desc: An English teacher in Spain picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon. Comedy drama set in 1966, starring Javier Camara, Natalia de Molina and Francesc Colomer.

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: An enigmatic gunslinger forms an uneasy alliance with a military veteran to track down a notorious outlaw - but tensions simmer as their very different motives for the hunt put them increasingly at odds. Sergio Leone's Western sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volonte, Josef Egger, Mara Krup and Klaus Kinski.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.

programme.title: The Crow's Egg
programme.desc: Comedy-drama following a pair of poverty stricken Indian brothers determined to earn the money to eat at a new pizza parlour. Starring Vignesh, Ramesh and Iyshwarya Rajesh.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five criminals are brought together by a police line-up, and decide to join forces to pull off one more big job. However, they discover their meeting was not a coincidence and that a mysterious crime lord has plans for them. Bryan Singer's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Kevin Spacey, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak, Stephen Baldwin, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Suzy Amis.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A successful doctor is shocked to discover his wife once harboured feelings for another man and resolves to get even by embarking on an affair of his own - only to end up involved with a dangerous exclusive cult. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Sydney Pollack and Marie Richardson.(n)

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: A cop embarks on his first day in narcotics, partnering a seasoned officer whose willingness to flout the rules forces him to question everything he has learnt. As they resort to extreme measures to crack a case, the rookie is left battling his conscience in a dangerous situation. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn and Tom Berenger.(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Bad Words
programme.desc: Jason Bateman directs and stars in this dark comedy about a 40-year-old misanthrope who enters children's spelling contests. With Kathryn Hahn, Rohan Chand and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: The Burning
programme.desc: A mysterious man attempts to rescue a young woman who has been kidnapped by the mercenaries who murdered her father and took control of his farm. Argentinean Western drama, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Alice Braga and Claudio Tolcachir.(n)

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: A slave trained to fight as a gladiator turns against his masters and leads an army of rebels in a fight for freedom against the Roman state. But as the rebellion gathers momentum, two senators do all they can to exploit the uprising for their own political ends. Stanley Kubrick's Oscar-winning epic, with Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Laurence Olivier, Jean Simmons, Charles Laughton and Peter Ustinov.(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: A hitman takes the chance to combine his latest assassination job with a trip back to his home town for a school reunion. The occasion starts to get complicated when an old flame turns up and rekindles their lost romance - while a rival killer harasses him to join an assassins' union. Black comedy drama, starring John Cusack, Minnie Driver, Dan Aykroyd, Joan Cusack and Alan Arkin.(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: A suburban family man has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with a friend of his teenage daughter. Struggling to cope with the unhealthy attention her father is lavishing on her friend, the girl begins a tentative relationship of her own, while her harassed mother is also having an affair. Sam Mendes' Oscar-winning black comedy drama, starring Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Mena Suvari and Wes Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Drug War
programme.desc: A drug dealer is hospitalised following an accident, which leads to him being identified by the police and facing the death penalty. He agrees to help bring down the criminal organisation he works for in return for his life, assisting undercover officers to infiltrate the syndicate. Gangster thriller, starring Louis Koo and Ka Tung Lam. In Mandarin and Cantonese.

programme.title: Forty Guns
programme.desc: A despotic Arizona landowner, who uses a band of hired gunmen to dominate her territory, becomes attracted to a determined US marshal sent to restore order. The lawman has renounced violence, but when tragedy strikes on the day of his wedding, he takes up arms once again. Western, starring Barbara Stanwyck, with Barry O'Sullivan and Dean Jagger.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Wealthy eccentric Sir Vincent Brampton arrives in Nairobi intent on hunting a legendary man-eating lion, and employs the services of disgraced big-game hunter Ken Duffield, who decides to use the expedition as an opportunity to settle an old score with the ruthless Kenyan terrorist who murdered his son. Adventure set during the Mau Mau Uprising in Kenya, starring Victor Mature, Roland Culver and Earl Cameron.

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: A 19th-century nobleman returns to his Californian home to find the local people cowed by the tyranny of a cruel military officer. Adopting the guise of a masked hero, he fights oppression wherever he finds it, while posing as a foppish aristocrat in his day-to-day life to divert suspicion. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Frank Langella, Ricardo Montalban, Gilbert Roland and Yvonne De Carlo.

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: An old man embarks on a bizarre cross-country journey to visit his estranged brother, hoping to heal the rift between them before it is too late. Though his eyesight leaves much to be desired, he carries on regardless - choosing a motorised lawnmower as his form of transport. David Lynch's drama, starring Richard Farnsworth, Sissy Spacek, Jane Galloway, Everett McGill and Harry Dean Stanton.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of the US president is determined to lead a normal life and manages to persuade him to let her enrol at college as a normal student. However, she is unaware her father has hired a young special agent to go undercover at the same college - which creates a dilemma when she falls in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Katie Holmes, Marc Blucas, Michael Keaton and Amerie.

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's biopic of the 16th president of the United States. In his tumultuous final months in office, Abraham Lincoln faces a struggle to bring the Civil War to an end and unite a divided nation, while also bringing about legislation to abolish slavery. Starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Tommy Lee Jones, Sally Field and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

programme.title: End of Watch
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles cops make their regular patrol of the city, dealing with petty offences while one records their lives on camera for a documentary project. The officers end up in over their heads when they stumble on evidence that could bring down a drug cartel, putting them squarely in the gang's firing line. Crime thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Pena.

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: The perpetually stoned duo plan a trip to Amsterdam, but no sooner have they boarded the plane when they are arrested for terrorist offences and shipped off to the notorious prison camp. Comedy sequel, starring John Cho, Kal Penn, Neil Patrick Harris and Rob Corddry.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien ambassador lands his spaceship in America and warns humanity that Earth risks imminent destruction by an interplanetary alliance unless it abandons its warlike ways - and is promptly shot by the military. The wounded visitor is forced to live among humans, but his powerful robot servant is poised to punish mankind for its aggression. Sci-fi drama, with Michael Rennie, Patricia Neal and Hugh Marlowe.

programme.title: Flight of the Navigator
programme.desc: A boy mysteriously disappears in 1978, and is found eight years later, having not aged a day. He escapes being experimented on by government scientists by taking off in a crashed alien spaceship. With the help of the robot pilot, he tries to find out what has happened to him and if he can get back home. Sci-fi adventure, starring Joey Cramer and Veronica Cartwright, with the voice of Paul Reubens.

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: An egocentric professor leads an expedition on a journey into the Amazon on a mission to prove his theory that dinosaurs still survive there. On arrival, they find the prehistoric beasts are all too real - and only one of the dangers they face. Fantasy adventure, based on Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel, starring Claude Rains, Michael Rennie and Jill St John.

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: The working day for two mismatched single professionals is thrown into turmoil when their children have to stay at home after missing a school trip. The pair agree to take it in turns to babysit while struggling to stick to their hectic schedules - but during the course of the day their feelings for each other blossom unexpectedly. Romantic comedy, starring George Clooney, Michelle Pfeiffer, Charles Durning and Mae Whitman.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: A librarian suffers from a strange condition that causes him to involuntarily move backwards and forwards in time. He marries a woman who was already in love with him after an encounter in his future and her past, but his journeys through history put a strain on their relationship, especially as he learns more about events that have yet to happen. Romantic sci-fi drama based on Audrey Niffenegger's novel, starring Rachel McAdams and Eric Bana.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Four American soldiers are sent on a mission into the mountains of Afghanistan to track down and eliminate a high-ranking terrorist leader. They soon find themselves faced with a terrible moral dilemma and a battle for survival against overwhelming odds. Fact-based drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch and Ben Foster.

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: A psychiatrist joins forces with a prostitute to investigate the murder of a patient, a frustrated middle-aged housewife who indulged her fantasies by embarking on an extramarital affair and was subsequently killed. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Michael Caine, Angie Dickinson, Nancy Allen, Keith Gordon and Dennis Franz.

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A repressed ballet dancer leads a sheltered life, devoted entirely to her art. She pursues the lead role in a production of Swan Lake, but the director convinces her she will only be capable of dancing the part if she embraces her darker impulses. This leads her into a destructive relationship with a rival that threatens her sanity. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Natalie Portman. With Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel and Winona Ryder.(n)

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: An ageing hard-bitten rancher expects his two sons to follow in his footsteps and keep order in their lawless land with the force of the gun. One of his boys is a gentle soul with no appetite for violence, but his brother is trigger-happy and one day takes a step too far - leaving his father with an impossible decision. Western, starring Van Heflin, Tab Hunter and James Darren.(n)

programme.title: Short Circuit
programme.desc: A military robot is struck by lightning and develops a mind of its own. The machine embarks on a series of comic misadventures, but the company that made him want him back. He realises his only hope is to convince the scientist who invented him that he really is alive. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Steve Guttenberg, Ally Sheedy and Fisher Stevens.(n)

programme.title: The House of Magic
programme.desc: A stray cat wanders into a magician's mansion, and finds it is full of strange gadgets. The illusionist allows him to stay, to the annoyance of his other pets, but the cat proves an invaluable addition to the group when their owner's scheming nephew plots to take the house for himself. Animated adventure, with the voices of Murray Blue and Doug Stone.(n)

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: A bemused schoolboy is escorted on a bizarre journey through time by a group of larcenous dwarfs. His adventures lead him to encounters with various characters from history - but none of them are quite what he had imagined. Terry Gilliam's fantasy comedy, starring Craig Warnock, David Rappaport, John Cleese, Michael Palin, Sean Connery, Ian Holm, Ralph Richardson and David Warner.(n)

programme.title: The Way Way Back
programme.desc: An introverted teenager joins his mother and her overbearing boyfriend on an awkward family holiday. He befriends a free-spirited employee at the nearby water park, and the relationship inspires him to assert his independence for the first time. Comedy drama, starring Liam James, Sam Rockwell, Steve Carell, Toni Collette and Allison Janney.(n)

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: An old man tells a journalist the story of his youth as a lobby boy at a hotel in Eastern Europe in the 1930s. He was taken under the wing of the establishment's dashing concierge, and is drawn into his misadventures as he becomes involved in a conflict over a valuable painting. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Ralph Fiennes, Tony Revolori, F Murray Abraham and Jude Law.(n)

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: A Soviet sniper becomes a national hero during the Second World War Battle of Stalingrad, so the Germans enlist a crack marksman of their own to deal with him. A lethal contest of wits follows as the two sharpshooters stalk each other, while the Russian also finds himself caught up in a love triangle with one of his friends. Drama, starring Jude Law, Ed Harris, Rachel Weisz, Joseph Fiennes, Bob Hoskins and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia help Ike get to know cousin Corabeth better.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy encounters a beautiful but unprincipled girl whose selfish ways cause hard feelings and suspicion toward Jim Bob's friend, Danny. Richard Thomas stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: May We Make Them Proud - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Albert leaves a smoking pipe in the basement of the school for the blind, and tragedy strikes when the building is engulfed in fire - causing the death of two children.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: May We Make Them Proud - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Albert is beside himself by guilt over causing the fire which claimed the lives of the Garveys and Mary's children. As the devastated mothers try to cope with their losses, he finds comfort from an unlikely source.

programme.title: A Touch of Hope
programme.desc: A man discovers he has the abilities of a faith healer. Initially reluctant, he agrees to use his gift to help doctors, but only in emergency cases. However, many in the medical community are suspicious of his claims, a conflict that comes to a head when he is asked to bring a doubting doctor's daughter out of a coma. Fact-based drama, starring Anthony Michael Hall, CCH Pounder, Abraham Benrubi and Fay Masterson.

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Diana: Her True Story

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: After emerging from a bitter divorce battle, single mother Joanna returns to the sleepy home town she could not wait to flee as a teenager. As she sets about rekindling old friendships, Joanna finds herself falling in love with an old flame. However, the man is married, and the pair's affair threatens to rock the community. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams and Kristen Holden-Ried.

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.desc: A couple expecting their first child are devastated by the news that the child will be stillborn. They resort to alcohol and infidelity to cope with their grief, ultimately destroying their marriage. However, when they learn they are expecting another child, they anxiously face an uncertain future. Fact-based drama, with Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina and Connie Nielsen.

programme.title: Those She Left Behind
programme.desc: Affluent expectant parents Scott and Sue Grimes look forward to starting the next stage of their lives with the arrival of their first child. However, when Sue unexpectedly dies in childbirth, Scott is forced to navigate the difficulties of raising his new daughter alone, and must summon the fortitude to tackle life as a single parent. Drama, starring Gary Cole and Mary Page Keller.

programme.title: The Kansas City Massacre
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a prison break in 1933 that left several law enforcement officers dead and the campaign by the FBI, under the leadership of the renowned agent Melvin Purvis, to bring the killers to justice. Starring Dale Robertson and Bo Hopkins.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A radio therapist's tangled personal life comes under scrutiny as the women associated with him are murdered one by one, beginning with his wife. The team follow up a number of leads, but first have to work out just what motivates the threatened celebrity - before the killer notches up another victim. Gritty crime drama, starring James Macpherson, Blythe Duff, John Michie and Colin McCredie.

programme.title: First Do No Harm
programme.desc: A woman decides to seek alternative forms of treatment for her epileptic son after the conventional methods employed by his doctors fail to have an impact on his welbeing. However, she encounters resistance from members of the medical establishment, who seek to take legal action to stop her removing her child from the hospital. Drama, based on a true story, starring Meryl Streep.

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels Oleson takes his travelling store into the countryside in a bid to escape his nagging wife's harsh tongue - but doesn't expect to fall in love. Drama, starring Richard Bull.

programme.desc: A mother and daughter's humdrum small-town life is radically changed by a trip to spend a weekend with a family friend in the country. Romantic drama, starring Sydney Penny, Scott Reeves, Kathleen Noone and Nicolas Coster.

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: A Day for Thanks on Walton's Mountain
programme.desc: As Thanksgiving approaches, Elizabeth resolves to gather the entire Walton family together again for an old-fashioned celebration - but struggles to persuade everyone to attend. Drama, starring Kami Cotler, Ralph Waite, Jon Walmsley and Ellen Corby.

programme.title: Stranger in the Family
programme.desc: A teenager is involved in a tragic car accident, leaving him with severe amnesia. During his struggle to come to terms with alienation and the consequent rebellion that ensues, his family are forced to accept the boy they once knew so well is now a stranger. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Teri Garr, Randle Mell and Sierra Samuel.

programme.title: Those She Left Behind
programme.desc: Affluent expectant parents Scott and Sue Grimes look forward to starting the next stage of their lives with the arrival of their first child. However, when Sue unexpectedly dies in childbirth, Scott is forced to navigate the difficulties of raising his new daughter alone, and must summon the fortitude to tackle life as a single parent. Drama, starring Gary Cole and Mary Page Keller.

programme.title: Someone Else's Child
programme.desc: Fact-based drama charting the tragic consequences of a maternity unit mix-up. A woman is distressed to discover she is not the biological mother of the seven-year-old she has brought up. She sets out to win custody of her real son, with traumatic consequences. Starring Lisa Hartman, Bruce Davison and Louise Fletcher.

programme.title: Return to Zero
programme.desc: A couple expecting their first child are devastated by the news that the child will be stillborn. They resort to alcohol and infidelity to cope with their grief, ultimately destroying their marriage. However, when they learn they are expecting another child, they anxiously face an uncertain future. Fact-based drama, with Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina and Connie Nielsen.

programme.title: Safe Harbor
programme.desc: A retired couple preparing to embark on a round-the-world sailing trip find themselves looking after a group of troubled teenage boys. The arrangement changes from short term to several months, but the experience proves a rewarding one for them and the kids, inspiring the couple to set up their own foster home. Drama, starring Treat Williams and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: Betty & Coretta
programme.desc: The widows of Martin Luther King and Malcolm X are left to raise their children alone following the assassination of their husbands. A close and supportive friendship develops between them as they deal with the challenges ahead and take up leading positions in the struggle for racial equality. Fact-based drama, with Angela Bassett and Mary J Blige.

programme.title: Ride to Freedom: The Rosa Parks Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the life of Rosa Parks, the black woman who famously refused to give up her seat on a bus to a white man in 1950s America. The action prompted a massive outpouring of anger and sparked the rise of the civil rights movement. Angela Bassett, Cicely Tyson and Peter Francis James star.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura's decision to accept a temporary teaching job in a nearby town prompts Almanzo to realise she's not a child any more - forcing him to finally confront his feelings for her. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert and Dean Butler.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The death of Adam's father jeopardises plans to build a new school for the blind in Walnut Grove. Almanzo proposes to Laura, but she is heartbroken when Charles forbids them to marry until she is 18. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert, Michael Landon and Dean Butler.(n)

programme.title: Within These Walls
programme.desc: A tenacious nun working in a high security women's prison realises the inmates need something to focus on - and sets out to persuade officials to allow the jailbirds to help train dogs for the disabled. Drama, starring Laura Dern, Ellen Burstyn and LaTanya Richardson.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben tries to win the attention of a special girl, but his attempts backfire miserably as she goes running into the arms of Jason.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia begin preparations for their 20th wedding anniversary, and John-Boy falls in love with an older woman.(n)

programme.title: A Walton Thanksgiving Reunion
programme.desc: The family battles a host of personal and romantic problems at a gathering in celebration of Thanksgiving, but also takes advantage of the holiday as an ideal chance to draw strength from one another. Drama based on the TV series, starring Richard Thomas, Ralph Waite, Michael Learned and Ellen Corby.(n)

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano.(n)

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.(n)

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.(n)

programme.title: In the Arms of a Killer
programme.desc: A rookie homicide cop lands herself in a dilemma after making the foolish mistake of becoming romantically involved with the prime suspect in a drug-related murder case. Thriller, starring Jaclyn Smith, John Spencer, Michael Nouri, Nina Foch and Sandahl Bergman.(n)

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: Engaging espionage adventure about a suave and courageous Navy officer assigned to pose as his own double - a renowned counterfeiter - in an effort to expose a gang of ruthless crooks. But his daring leaves him in trouble when he discovers he's under suspicion of double-dealing from all sides. Michael Craig, Julia Arnall and Brenda de Banzie star.(n)

programme.title: The Good Times Are Killing Me
programme.desc: A successful lawyer from Washington DC, Kate Derby, collapses and falls unconscious as she travels to London to gather information for a case. When she awakens, she is in a secured drug and alcohol rehab facility, and is convinced she has been framed by the man she is mounting a case against. Inside, she befriends a couple of strange characters, who help her crack an important case. Drama, starring Kelly Rowan and Rupert Graves.(n)

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.(n)

programme.title: In the Best Interest of the Children
programme.desc: A manic depressive woman is released from an institution and tries to regain custody of her five children. However, their foster parents wish to officially adopt them, and her eldest daughter believes that would be for the best. As a bitter legal battle ensues, the mother's mental health begins to deteriorate once more. Fact-based drama, starring Sarah Jessica Parker and Sally Struthers.

Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar

programme.title: Saw III

Shawnee Smith costars in this tense sequel

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.
programme.desc: Comedic documentary about a small Oklahoma town and their ambitious yearly theatrical endeavor: staging the passion play with over 100 cast members to the backdrop of a bizarre reproduction of Jerusalem built in the foothills of the Wichita mountains. Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: Rugrats In Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Finsters and the Pickles travel to the City of Lights, where Chucky hopes that his dad Chas will find him a new mother while he repairs the malfunctioning reptiles at a European dinosaur theme park. Based on the beloved Nickelodeon series, this animated family adventure features the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Susan Sarandon, Michael Bell, Cheryl Chase, John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, Mako, Casey Kasem and Tim Curry

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)
